name: fountaingrace.org
description: 1. Create a **public repo** and add all files from this project. 2. In Vercel, **New Project → Import** the repo. 3. Framework preset: **Other**; Output directory: **/** (root). No build step needed. 4. Add your domain: **fountaingrace.org** → set **www** → redirect non‑www to **www** or vice versa (match canonical).
